scripts.lighthouse:home: rm -rf .lighthouseci && rm -rf ./lighthouse-reports/home && lhci collect --url=https://maxvideoai.com/?nolocale=1 --collect.preset=lighthouse:default && mkdir -p ./lighthouse-reports/home && cp -R .lighthouseci/* ./lighthouse-reports/home/ && rm -rf .lighthouseci
